Issue.creator: clempo
Issue.summary: Return type of BlockInfo.getTransactionActionInfos() does not match the method name
Issue.description: , it does not return Iterable. This is very confusing. I doubt it was ever meant to return Iterable, so this is probably an error in the method name. To fix this properly, we would also have to rename BlockInfo.TransactionInfoIterator Compare this to Iterable TransactionEnvelopeInfo.getTransactionActionInfos() which makes a lot more sense. >
